hero.title: All the images you need, in one API.
hero.subtitle: Buy tokens, connect to our APIs, and centralize your images with PicNode.

unified.title: Unified hub of visual APIs
unified.description: Access icons, flags, logos, and place images in a single centralized endpoint.

tokens.title: Configurable and secure tokens
tokens.description: Configure validity, rate limit, and total requests according to your needs.

integration.title: Simple integration via REST
integration.description: RESTful APIs easy to integrate in any language or framework.

flags.title: Flags API
flags.description: High-resolution country flags, updated and consistent.

places.title: Places API
places.description: Images of tourist spots and famous places around the world.

logos.title: Logos API
logos.description: Company, brand, and organization logos in vector format.

icons.title: Icons API
icons.description: Library with thousands of icons for any type of interface.

security.title: Sanctum Security
security.description: Robust authentication with Laravel Sanctum for maximum security.

flexibility.title: Flexible configuration
flexibility.description: Adjust your tokens according to your project's demand.

dashboard.title: Dashboard with statistics
dashboard.description: Track usage, consumption, and performance in real-time.

pricing.title: Usage-based pricing
pricing.description: Pay only for what you use, with no fixed monthly fees.

cta.title: Start centralizing your visual assets now.
